entry.title: Tuesday night: Wet snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wet snow mixed with rain beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 4 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
